projects.name: Vision Bucket
description: Engineered front-end, back-end, and middleware architectures in React for users to favorite and organize their favorite movies from the iMDB database
Designed mockups of different pages on the website in Figma
Communicated with 2 team members on GitHub repository over the span of 3 months in Agile development cycles

projects.name: Game on
description: Engineered front-end architecture in React Native for users to create an account, edit their profile, post in the forums to find fellow players, and message other players
Designed mockups and prototypes of different pages on the website in Figma
Communicated with 4 team members on GitHub repository over the span of 3 months in Agile development cycles

projects.name: Search Engine
description: Programmed search engine in Python that outputs results from the UCI directory
Communicated with 3 team members on GitHub repository over the span of 3 months in Agile development cycles
